item.title: By: Jim Ramsden
item.dc:creator: Jim Ramsden
item.description: No probs - another great site this year, and i've seen it mentioned everywhere in the last few days. We've added the event to our calendar at work, and we'll have to grab some earlybird tickets.
item.content:encoded: No probs – another great site this year, and i’ve seen it mentioned everywhere in the last few days. We’ve added the event to our calendar at work, and we’ll have to grab some earlybird tickets.

item.title: By: Jon Moss
item.dc:creator: Jon Moss
item.description:
Jim, thanks for featuring HDLive!
Would be great if you fancy coming up for it...
Best,
Jon
item.content:encoded:
Jim, thanks for featuring HDLive!

Would be great if you fancy coming up for it…
